sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>The character removes setback dice equal to the character's ranks in Utinni! from checks made to find or scavenge items or gear. These checks could include Negotiation, Perception, or other checks, depending on circumstances and the GM's discretion. Such skill checks take half their normal time (this does not decrease with multiple ranks of Utinni!).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Utinni!</name> <number>TAL0001236</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 13:19:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>73c8dc2a2fbf1490e0f497eef699b695</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 13:19:29</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
